description: Invokes the Men&Mice SOAP command AddRoleToGroup (http://api.menandmice.com/8.1.0/#AddRoleToGroup)
name: add_role_to_group

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a Men&Mice server.

password.description: Optional override of the Men&Mice password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

port.description: Optional override of the Men&Mice port in <connection>.

server.description: Optional override of the Men&Mice server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

session.description: Login session cookie. If empty then username/password will be used to login prior to running this operation

transport.description: Optional override of the Men&Mice transport in <connection>.

username.description: Optional override of the Men&Mice username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
